name: NPCs
description: Take the role of the lone player character in a land of NPCs hell bent on your destruction with this satirical take on modern culture. Click here for 10 reasons why Playable Characters are a threat to our democracy! Try out the new NPC HQ map!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later, 32 bit or 64 bit Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 3 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 400 series or later, and AMD 6870 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Not very graphically intensive, should run well on any modern PC
